import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import './index.scss' import LogoS from '../../assets/images/NYC_S.png' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faHome, faUser, faEnvelope, faBriefcase } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faGithub, faLinkedin } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' const Sidebar = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(true); const toggleOpen = () => { setOpen(!open) } return (
) } export default Sidebar
